document.full_text: this week, as oklahoma city (once the seattle supersonics) began its playoff series against memphis (once the vancouver grizzlies), fans across the pacific northwest cringed.
document.title: in the pacific northwest, a playoff matchup stings
lines_and_colors: this week, as oklahoma city (once the seattle supersonics) began its playoff series against memphis (once the vancouver grizzlies), fans across the pacific northwest cringed.
